name: Astesice×Live, Kairi
effect: [CONT](VC):All of your rear-guards placed this turn get [Power] +5000.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your soul has a card with "Kairi" in its card name, choose up to two of your rear-guards, return them to your hand, choose two cards from your hand, and call them to (RC).
flavor: The idols shined brightly like stars in the spotlight on stage.

name: Coming Beauty, Herminia
effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast]1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.Powerful－[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if the total number of cards in your soul and face up cards in your damage zone is zero, [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your rear-guards with the Powerful ability, and [Stand] it. Reduce the next [Counter-Blast] you pay this turn by ①.
flavor: The movement caused by us, burn it into your eyes!

name: Scintillate Rays, Ophelia
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle your "Prismagica, Wilista" on (VC) attacked, perform all of the following according to the cards you [Soul-Blast] for your vanguard's ability or played this turn.・"Truehearted Ruby"‐This unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn. ・"Everlasting Sapphire"‐[COST][Counter-Blast]1 & Put a back row center rear-guard on the bottom of your deck], [Stand] this unit, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Friends that aim for the heights together. That is a treasure amongst treasures.

name: MiMish, Fortia
effect: Friend－[CONT](VC/RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have five or more other "Friends", [COST][Counter-Blast]1 & discard a card from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets [Power] +5000/drive -1 until end of turn.
flavor: I want to create it with everyone! The very best stage!

name: Canon of Overlaid-spinning, Dietlinde
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if "Rondo of Eventide Moon, Feltyrosa" is on your (VC), [COST][Soul-Blast]1], choose a <Ghost> normal unit not named "Canon of Overlaid-spinning, Dietlinde" from your drop, and call it to an open (RC). [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, put this unit on the bottom of your deck. (Must be performed)
flavor: The night, it has only just begun.

name: Privilege Potential, Phenael
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Alestiel" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast]1], choose a card from your bind zone, and put it into your hand. If you put a card into your hand, choose a card from your hand, and bind it.Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades)－[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], choose one of your opponent's grade 3 or greater vanguards, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The talent that shakes the world, slowly rouses itself as it looks upon the skies.

name: Hoppin' Stellar, Melty
effect: Friend－[CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to one card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from your hand, and call it to (RC). If you called a card, draw a card.
flavor: Woke up perfectly! Today will be a good day!

name: Mya Mya Ensemble, Nala
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], choose a card from your soul, and call it to an open (RC). Then, for each card in your soul, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.Powerful－[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater vanguard, if your soul has no cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Look, you should sing along too!

name: Definite Growth, Rugena
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a unit with "Earnescorrect" in its card name, if you have a vanguard with "Clarissa" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast]1 & retire this unit], search your deck for up to one grade 3 or less card with "Earnescorrect" in its card name, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Girls, if you don't see me for even a day, you should keep your eyes peeled.

name: Symphonic Sky, Lyudmila
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast]1], and perform all of the following according to the Songs sung this turn.・"Romantic Happiness"‐Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・"Twilight Sound of Waves"‐Look at the top card of your deck.・"Madder Red Runway"‐You may return this unit to your hand. ・"Six-Flower Fractale"‐[COST][Discard a card from your hand], and draw a card.
flavor: What will Loro be singing today~♪

name: Sweet×Sweet
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast]1]!Look at five cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Hawa~♡Which one should I choose? Which one do I choose!?

name: Challenge to Self, Trudie
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from your deck or hand during your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Wilista" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], search your deck or drop for up to one Gem card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
flavor: It surely is difficult. But, if I learn to sing this song…...!

name: Enveloping Compassion, Torquel
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades)－[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, you may put this unit into your soul.
flavor: By neatly arranging the feathers, you can lift up your mood~!

name: Bathing Fountain, Terues
effect: Powerful－[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your soul has no cards, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], this unit gets "[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, draw a card." until end of that battle, choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Not long after, "No playing in the fountains" was added to the school rules.

name: Detour Together, Elvi
effect: [CONT]Front Row (RC):All of your rear-guards with different card names as this unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, you may [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Hey, where should we go today~?

name: Motivation Aplenty! Arlette
effect: Friend－[CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have three or more other "Friends", [COST][Soul-Blast]1], and return this unit to your hand.
flavor: Nn~! Well, let us work hard today too-!

name: Along with Smiles, Geezya
effect: [CONT](GC):All of your units with "Earnescorrect" in their card names get [Shield] +10000.[CONT](GC):All of your rear-guards with "Earnescorrect" in their card names cannot be hit.
flavor: Fun things together with everyone. Because that brings the most happiness.

name: Aim for the Horizon, Piael
effect: Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades)－[CONT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Alestiel" in its card name, this unit can attack a grade 3 or greater vanguard from the back row.
flavor: Even if you are far away, I believe my voice will certainly reach you.

name: Grazioso Prince, Meredith
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one Order card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Are you alright? Here, take my hand.

name: Sound in the Wind, Ducayla
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your unit with the Friend ability is placed in the same column as this unit, if you have three or more other "Friends", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: The breeze that gently brushed across the face. Listen to the music that flows from it.

name: Beware of Overeating! Eileen
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
flavor: Nom nom. This one's a hit.

name: Next Step, Laplume
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Astesice" in its card name, choose a grade 2 or less card with "Astesice" in its card name from your soul, and you may call it to an open (RC) as [Rest]. If you called it during your battle phase, [Stand] that called unit.
flavor: A dance that you find yourself following before noticing. That is the kind of dance being aimed for.

name: Spokesperson of Heavenly Voice, Herjuel
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades)－[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], choose a card with the White Wings ability not named "Spokesperson of Heavenly Voice, Herjuel" from your drop, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: I'll give you my endorsement! You definitely have the talent!

name: Eternally Indistinguishable Aubade, Irene
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a <Ghost> normal unit rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, you may put that boosted rear-guard on the bottom of the deck.
flavor: It is fine even if tomorrow does not come. Since I am happy at this very moment.

name: Burgeoning Tone, Signe
effect: Powerful－[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has no cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with the Powerful ability, [Stand] this unit, choose a card from your soul, and put it into your drop. (This effect is mandatory).
flavor: A singing voice that is clear, and strong. Without limits.

name: Head to the Pinnacle, Katlein
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast]1 & discard two cards from your hand], and draw two cards.
flavor: To make them think "I want to follow you", is also a type of talent.

name: Hasty Panic, Floortje
effect: [CONT](RC):If your "Six-Flower Fractale" was sung this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Failure, shall be the nourishment for the next success.

name: Blessed Ray of Clear Skies, Rahsiel
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades)－[CONT](RC)/(GC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000. During your opponent's turn, this unit gets "Intercept" and [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Should the pure white wish reach the skies, blessings will pour down without fail.

name: Key to Intimacy, Cucca
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Clarissa" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast]1 & retire this unit], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 or less card with "Earnescorrect" in its card name from among them, call it to an open (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: If you sing it like this, good things will come your way♪

name: Natural Chirp, Melria
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have five or more units with "Earnescorrect" in their different card names, [COST][[Rest] this unit], choose an Order card from your drop, put it into your hand, and put this unit on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: It's only when you polish your natural sparkle that you will draw the gaze of others.

name: Bashful Striver, Kinkee
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose a grade 2 or less normal unit with "Astesice" in its card name from your drop, and you may put it into your soul. If you put a card into your soul, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Chase after your aspirations. You will definitely reach them one day.

name: Straight Gaze, Konstanze
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast]1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: I have no intentions to lose. Other than to dear sister.

name: Attract Peach, Ertines
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power] +2000. Powerful－[CONT](VC):If your soul has no cards, when you would ride "Coming Beauty, Herminia" from your ride deck, you can ride without discarding a card from your hand.
flavor: It is inevitable that you will become interested in me. Because of my appearance.

name: Elegance Moment, Loppil
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][reveal a card with "Kairi" in its card name from your hand], and this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: If you take a short break, I believe it will be easier to show results.

name: Authentic Melody, Esmeralda
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your "Madder Red Runway" was sung this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Aiming for the glorious stage--the young girls continue to challenge themselves.

name: Pure and Proper, Yakomina
effect: [CONT](RC):If you played an Order this turn, this unit gets "Boost".
flavor: Everyone is watching. Please straighten your collar.

name: Cheshire Smile, Larisa
effect: Friend－[CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your other "Friends".
flavor: Nihihi♪ I thought of something really good♡

name: MiMish, Rikashenna
effect: Friend－[CONT](VC/RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[CONT](VC):If you have another "Friend", when you would ride "MiMish, Fortia" from your ride deck, you can ride without discarding a card from your hand.
flavor: Because I want to steadily increase the number of things that I can do.

name: Wings of Notables, Elnael
effect: Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades)－[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge]2.
flavor: To stand before the audience. Don't you think its better to have a certain level of grace?

name: Intercommunicating Gaze, Feodora
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Wilista" in its card name, [COST][put a Gem card from your drop on the bottom of your deck], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Magical powers that melt hearts reside within the light of those pupils.

name: Nonchalant and Composed, Ercilia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, choose a card from your soul, put it into your drop, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. (This effect is mandatory)
flavor: It's okay to go at your own pace, is what the teacher said.

name: Wraith Embrace, Betina
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other <Ghost> is placed on another (RC) in the same column as this unit, choose a card with "Feltyrosa" in its card name from your drop, and put it into your soul.
flavor: Dear sister――Dear sister belongs only to me. Fufu, ufufufu.

name: Precious Tune, Edwige
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: The singing voice that stirs the heart became ripples.

name: Transparent Snowy Night, Beretoi
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: With such a lovely night. It is a waste to be sleeping.

name: Snowskip, Palvi
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Twirling excitedly, in the snow. With her favorite umbrella.

name: Fingertips that Uplift Hearts, Edelgard
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your other <Ghost> rear-guards.
flavor: I am looking forward to having my dear sister hear it.

name: Faithful Eye, Liliana
effect: Powerful－[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your soul has no cards, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: A verse left behind by the legendary divas. It permeates through your core.

name: Leeway of Seniority, Altariel
effect: [CONT](RC):If this unit is a "Friend", this unit gets "Boost".
flavor: One must not forget, to have ample time to enjoy the fragrance too.

name: The Flawless Me, Fiamma
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, you may return this unit to your hand.
flavor: I have to prepare for the next lesson…

name: Beating Heart, Kamila
effect: [CONT]Front Row (RC):If your "Twilight Sound of Waves" was sung this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +2000.
flavor: Awawa… Keep calm… Keep calm…!

name: Circling Lyric, Ashley
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have no other rear-guards in your front row, this unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects, and cannot be attacked.
flavor: It feels right on the tip of my tongue though~.

name: Permeating Kindness, Paline
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your battle phase, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: That kindness displayed, is truly devilish.

name: Pouring Expectation, Ilta
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Clarissa" in its card name, choose one of your vanguards, and you may have that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you do, at the end of that battle, put this unit on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: The talents brought out by the school also assists in the development of the next generation.

name: Charmed in the Moonlit Night, Mechtild
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, if you have another <Ghost>, choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Some day, together with dear sister only.

name: Happy Tasting, Tigr
effect: Powerful－[CONT](GC):If your soul has no cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Eat heartily to build up stamina. This is also part of my daily efforts.

name: After School as Always, Yulia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a "Friend", this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Roar-! Hey~ you pose too~.

name: Wakey World, Elisa
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your "Romantic Happiness" was sung this turn, you may [Soul-Charge]1.
flavor: Even the boring route to school, becomes a slightly special path.

name: Conspicuous Anxiety, Kaadya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Astesice" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Thoughts of rivalry? S-such a thing, I don't have any…...

name: Shiny Coat, Marucia
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your drop has three or more Gem cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: With hair as alluring as precious gems.

name: Radiance Pride, Irmeli
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast]1 & Retire this unit], choose up to two non-grade 1 normal units from your drop, and return them to your deck and shuffle it.
flavor: Of course! I will be the one that shines the brightest!

name: Earnest Stare, Ivetta
effect: Friend－ [CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[CONT](RC):If you have another "Friend", this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: I must be careful to not stand out too much during this chorus.

name: Song of Salvation, Tulael
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades)－[CONT](GC):This unit gets [Shield] +10000.
flavor: Chasing dreams, and fulfilling the duties of an angel.

name: Delightful Encounter, Gertie
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your vanguard's grade is equal to or less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, [COST][Soul-Blast]1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Taking a different path, on days with the inclination to take it slow.

name: Sniping Eyeful, Leranje
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast]1 & Discard a card from your hand], and draw a card.Powerful－[CONT](VC):If your soul has no cards, when you would ride "Attract Peach, Ertines" from your ride deck, you can ride without discarding a card from your hand.
flavor: If you are bewitched by the devil, it won't end well for you.

name: Thorough Rest, Melmahr
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have zero or four or more rear-guards, this unit gets [Shield] +10000.
flavor: Rest time is for resting! It's not good to do things halfheartedly.

name: Fluent Style, Marijn
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast]1], and this unit gets "Powerful－[CONT](RC):If your soul has no cards, this unit gets [Power] +2000." until end of turn.
flavor: To ensure that I look perfect, at all times.

name: MiMish, Azhachir
effect: Friend－[CONT](VC/RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "MiMish, Rikashenna", call this card to (RC).
flavor: I picked a new score that caught my interest-. Want to listen to it together-?

name: Morning Routine, Aera
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, you may return this unit to your hand.
flavor: I can do it! If it is the  me of today!

name: Awaiting Smile, Maruel
effect: Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades)－[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, you may return this unit to your hand.
flavor: Encores, it'd be great if I can get one ♡

name: Cutie Topic, Rabeena
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: You will become enamored soon!

name: MiMish, Tubbylila
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The sun is warm~♪ Let's relax a bit more… no?

name: Wings Dancing in the Blue Skies, Antia
flavor: There's still a lot so make sure you eat up~♪

name: Surreal Voice, Gilberta
flavor: The mysterious but clear and vibrant voice, leads the pixies into a joyful dance.

name: Haughty Missy, Arroel
flavor: Now, you girls! Stop holding us back!

name: Bouyantly Gaming, Gisele
flavor: You will not be able to find her in classes for a few days after the release of a new game.

name: Hearts Connect, Rufina
flavor: Okay okay~♪ Then, I shall go greet everyone~!

name: Picturesque, Luana
flavor: Make sure you take a good picture.

name: Hushed Diva, Hortense
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: The young girl sings. Spreading from the depths of her heart, a gentle sound.

name: Sigh of Relief, Fabiola
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Now now, let us calm down while having tea~.

name: Thoughts into Forms
effect: If you have six or more units, play this with [COST][Soul-Blast]2]![Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: To my beloved, with special ♡ packed in!

name: Attract Peach, Ertines
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power] +2000. Powerful－[CONT](VC):If your soul has no cards, when you would ride "Coming Beauty, Herminia" from your ride deck, you can ride without discarding a card from your hand.

name: Sniping Eyeful, Leranje
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast]1 & Discard a card from your hand], and draw a card.Powerful－[CONT](VC):If your soul has no cards, when you would ride "Attract Peach, Ertines" from your ride deck, you can ride without discarding a card from your hand.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

effect: [CONT](RC):If you played an Order this turn, this unit gets "Boost".
